hadith.chapterTitle: The Struggle (in the Cause of Allah)
hadith.body:
Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said. "The (Hell) Fire is surrounded with all kinds of desires and passions, while Jannah is surrounded with adversities."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].
- السابع‏:‏ عنه أن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم قال‏:‏ ‏"‏ حجبت النار بالشهوات، وحجبت الجنة بالمكاره‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
